results.content: Cours beaucoup trop simple pour s'appeler "Expert Ruby On Rails 5"
results.content_html: Cours beaucoup trop simple pour s'appeler "Expert Ruby On Rails 5"

results.content:
Since I am returning to Rails and not starting from scratch, I really appreciate that level of detail and verbosity is kept under control and intentional "errors" are included in order to demonstrate typical course of action and correction.
Useful indeed.
results.content_html:
Since I am returning to Rails and not starting from scratch, I really appreciate that level of detail and verbosity is kept under control and intentional "errors" are included in order to demonstrate typical course of action and correction.
Useful indeed.

results.content: Excelente Profesor bien explicado paso a paso
results.content_html: Excelente Profesor bien explicado paso a paso

results.content: Very clear lessons for an intermediate willing to refresh concepts and get a better understanding of the Rails 5 workflow and new features.
results.content_html: Very clear lessons for an intermediate willing to refresh concepts and get a better understanding of the Rails 5 workflow and new features.
